trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> objects that represent the nodes in the tree view of the **XML Structure** task pane, which indicates the elements that a user has applied to a document.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象集合，表示“XML 结构”任务窗格的树状视图（指示用户应用于文档的元素）中的节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control represents a collection of XML elements with the same name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件表示具有相同名称的 XML 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: When you map elements that the schema allows to appear more than once onto a Microsoft Office Word document at design time, Visual Studio creates <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> for the elements.
trans-unit.target: 当你映射架构允许显示不止一次到 Microsoft Office Word 文档在设计时，Visual Studio 创建的元素<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>的元素。

trans-unit.source: A schema can allow an element to appear more than once when the `maxOccurs` attribute of the element or the element's ancestors is set to > 1.
trans-unit.target: 架构可以允许元素时出现一次以上`maxOccurs`元素或元素的上级特性设置为 > 1。

trans-unit.source: If the schema sets the `maxOccurs` attribute for the element and its ancestors to 1, Visual Studio creates an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> control instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果架构集`maxOccurs`元素及其上级为 1，Visual Studio 的属性创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>改为控制。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> controls can be created only in Word document-level projects at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> 在设计时，可以仅在 Word 文档级项目中创建控件。

trans-unit.source: They cannot be created at run time or in application-level projects.
trans-unit.target: 也不能在运行时或在应用程序级项目中创建。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md) and [How to: Add XMLNodes Controls to Word Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnodes-controls-to-word-documents.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md)和[如何： 向 Word 文档添加 XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnodes-controls-to-word-documents.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The name of the element in the XML schema designated in the <c>Namespace</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 <c>Namespace</c> 参数中指定的 XML 架构中的元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: Because XML is case-sensitive, the spelling of the element specified in the <c>Name</c> parameter must be exactly as it appears in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 因为 XML 区分大小写，所以在 <c>Namespace</c> 参数中指定的元素的拼写必须和它在架构中显示的完全一致。

trans-unit.source: If it does not match any of the element names in the schema specified in the <c>Namespace</c> parameter, an error is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果它与在 <c>Namespace</c> 参数中指定的架构中的任何一个元素名称都不匹配，则会显示一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The name of the schema as defined in the schema.
trans-unit.target: 在架构中定义的架构名称。

trans-unit.source: The <c>Namespace</c> parameter is case-sensitive and must be spelled exactly as it appears in the schema.
trans-unit.target: <c>Namespace</c> 参数区分大小写并且必须和它在架构中显示的名称拼写完全一致。

trans-unit.source: If the specified namespace cannot be found in any of the schemas attached to the document, an error is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在附加到文档的任何架构中均无法找到指定的命名空间，则显示一个错误。

trans-unit.source: The range to which you want to apply the element.
trans-unit.target: 要将该元素应用到的范围。

trans-unit.source: The default is to place the element tags at the insertion point or around the selection if a text is selected.
trans-unit.target: 默认为将元素标记放在插入点处或选定内容的周围（如果选择了一段文本）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents a newly added element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示新添加的元素的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> object that represents a newly added element.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示新添加的元素的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.source: The code displays a message box before a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> is deleted from the document and after a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> is added to the document.
trans-unit.target: 代码将显示消息框，然后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>从文档和之后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Add%2A> method to add a new element to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection at a specified range and programmatically raise the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Add%2A>方法添加到新的元素<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合在指定范围内并以编程方式引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`, which has a parent <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `SampleNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`，其中具有父<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`SampleNode`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> to the collection or to one of its descendents.
trans-unit.target: 在用户向集合或其子代之一添加新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.source: The code displays a message box before a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> is deleted from the document and after a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> is added to the document.
trans-unit.target: 代码将显示消息框，然后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>从文档和之后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Add%2A> method to add a new element to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection at a specified range and programmatically raise the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Add%2A>方法添加到新的元素<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合在指定范围内并以编程方式引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`, which has a parent <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `SampleNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`，其中具有父<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`SampleNode`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> object that represents the Microsoft Office Word application.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 应用程序的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> object that represents the Microsoft Office Word application.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 Microsoft Office Word 应用程序的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Application%2A> property to minimize the active application window.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Application%2A>属性以最小化活动应用程序窗口。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control named `InsertMemoToNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件名为`InsertMemoToNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user deletes a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> or descendent node from the collection, before the control is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当用户从集合中删除 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> 或子代节点时，在该控件被删除之前发生。

trans-unit.source: If the `InUndoRedo` parameter is `true`, you should not change the XML in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InUndoRedo`参数是`true`，不应更改文档中的 XML。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.BeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.source: The code displays a message box before a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> is deleted from the document and after a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> is added to the document.
trans-unit.target: 代码将显示消息框，然后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>从文档和之后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Add%2A> method to add a new element to an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection at a specified range and programmatically raise the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Add%2A>方法添加到新的元素<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合在指定范围内并以编程方式引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.AfterInsert>事件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`, which has a parent <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `SampleNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`，其中具有父<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`SampleNode`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside one of the nodes or descendant nodes of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection, from an area outside of the context of the node.
trans-unit.target: 当光标从节点上下文以外的区域移入 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合的节点或子代节点之一时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> event differs from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>事件区别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> event is raised only when the context changes and can be raised for multiple <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> controls nested at the same hierarchical level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>仅上下文更改时引发事件并会引发多个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件嵌套处于相同层次结构级别。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor is moved from one of the nodes or descendant nodes of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection, to an area outside of the context of the original node.
trans-unit.target: 当光标从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合的节点或子代节点之一移到原始节点上下文以外的区域时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> event differs from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>事件区别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> event is raised only when the context changes and can be raised for multiple <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> controls nested at the same hierarchical level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>仅上下文更改时引发事件并会引发多个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件嵌套处于相同层次结构级别。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Count%2A> property to display the number of items in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Count%2A>属性来显示中的项的数目<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection was created in Microsoft Office Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建集合，则此属性返回的十六进制数 4d535744，它表示字符串"MSWD。"

trans-unit.source: This value can also be represented by the constant <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>.
trans-unit.target: 此值也可以表示由常数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Count%2A> property to display whether an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control was created in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Count%2A>属性来显示是否<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建控件。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control named `InsertMemoToNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件名为`InsertMemoToNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor is moved out of one of the nodes of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当光标从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合的节点之一移出时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect> event differs from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>事件区别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the enumerator for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an enumerator for an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection and then iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.GetEnumerator%2A>方法以获取的枚举数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合，然后循环访问集合。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" />，它表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> that represents the underlying native object for the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" />，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件的基础本机对象。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pass a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName> control to a method or property that expects the underlying object (a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>).
trans-unit.target: 不能将传递<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>控件添加到方法或属性需要基础对象 ( <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>)。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.InnerObject%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName> control to access the underlying <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.InnerObject%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>控件，用于访问基础<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: You then pass this object to a method or property that expects a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 然后将该对象传递给方法或属性需要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的主机项和主机控件编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the position of the node that you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 指示要检索的节点的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Item%2A> property returns a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> object rather than a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Item%2A>属性返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>对象而不是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Programmatic Limitations of Host Items and Host Controls](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[限制的主机项和主机控件编程](/visualstudio/vsto/programmatic-limitations-of-host-items-and-host-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Item%2A> property to get the first <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName> in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Item%2A>属性来获取第一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode?displayProperty=fullName>中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Item%2A> property implicitly when a specific index of the collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Item%2A>指定集合中的特定索引时隐式的属性。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> that represents the document containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" />，它表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合的文档。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" /> that represents the document containing the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document" />，表示包含 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合的文档。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Parent%2A> property to display the name of the parent document of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Parent%2A>属性来显示的名称的父文档<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> control named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>控件名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside one of the nodes of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当光标放置在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合的一个节点中时发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select> event differs from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>事件区别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNodes Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNodes 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnodes-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextEnter>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes.ContextLeave>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes> collection named `SampleInsertNodes`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes>集合名为`SampleInsertNodes`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is a validation error in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 当在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNodes" /> 控件中存在验证错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: If the **Validate document against attached schema** option is set, this event is raised for every invalid element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果**附加架构验证文档**设置选项，则为集合中每个无效元素，将引发此事件。
